name: Cryptor.js
tagline: Cryptor is a javascript library that encrypts and disencrypt text with homemade encryption methods
body:
## Welcome to Cryptor Home Page.
### Encrypt text easily:

```
return encrypt(text,method)
```

Examples:
```
return encrypt('hello','eof');
Result: 2HaUs,rSYrSYbÑ$¿¡53-0-89-0-33-0¿¡97

return encrypt('hello','eof');
Result: nSoK(6DKLDKLzf.¿¡26-1-87-0-27-0¿¡97

return encrypt('hello','sxf');
Result: Q:KHOñys%c}S%c}S-l/ÑB7g$e%$x_u-EÑ3:-9k]K5KTir[h'2`p@7OJ}7OJ}V8Oc¿¡42-0-29-1-85-0-5¿¡164

return encrypt('hello','vne');
Result: 9G~02¿¡98

return encrypt('hello','vne');
Result: 242590414213222388222388515223¿¡63-1-62-1-91-1¿¡99
```

### Also disencrypt text easily:

```
return disencrypt(text)
```

Examples:
```
return disencrypt('2HaUs,rSYrSYbÑ$¿¡53-0-89-0-33-0¿¡97');
Result: hello

return disencrypt('nSoK(6DKLDKLzf.¿¡26-1-87-0-27-0¿¡97');
Result: hello

return disencrypt('Q:KHOñys%c}S%c}S-l/ÑB7g$e%$x_u-EÑ3:-9k]K5KTir[h'2`p@7OJ}7OJ}V8Oc¿¡42-0-29-1-85-0-5¿¡164');
Result: hello

return disencrypt('9G~02¿¡98');
Result: hello

return disencrypt('242590414213222388222388515223¿¡63-1-62-1-91-1¿¡99');
Result: hello
```

### Methods available
Id | Method | Description
------------ | ------------- | -------------
eof | Ezeoleaf | Characters and numbers
vne | Vigenere | Characters and numbers
num | Numeric | Only number
sxf | SixtyFour | Characters and numbers with a minimum length of 64

#### Note
*Cryptor comes with a default dictionary, but it can be changed following some steps:*
* Open GenerateDictionary.html
* Click on Generate
* Replace the given dictionary in the dictionary of the library (scripts/cryptor.js and scripts/cryptor.min.js)

### Authors and Contributors
I'm @ezeoleaf, the author of Cryptor, but anyone can contribute to it
